and keeps going and going never stops rolling this and fills up the console very very fast i have no clue im useing a dev 7 base and i can connect with localhost but not my ip or the no-ip i have useing mopar client and a delta client :/ any help will be useful to this problem

item.title: Need help with server login
item.dc:creator: @pitchblac23 pitchblac23
item.description:
@pitchblac23 wrote:

and idea on how to fix this the client im useing works well with the original source and i have also used moparscape 3 for it as well i have searched a lil on google for and help on it and have turned up nothing

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server login
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

The stream classed got nulled because it was receiving or handling malformed packets.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server login
item.dc:creator: @pitchblac23 pitchblac23
item.description:
@pitchblac23 wrote:

i have port forwarded the server port 43594 but i dont think this is the problem i havent added much to the source im useing as before its a devo 7 and i can also use delta but im useing devo cuz of the ability to use any client

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server login
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

You need to post the lines the errors occur on

Read full topic
